e.t:
## about

I am Haralampi Staykov and I am a technologist.

This website contains thoughts that are offerings to the one who whats to read them.

I don’t claim to know better, nor I want to convince you into anything. The world is as it is and I wander in it the same way you do.

Thoughts can light a path. Taking that path or choosing another, is how we walk our way.

You can contact me on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/haralampi/) or send me an [email](mailto:work@haralampi.com).

## current engagements

### contributor to sofmon
[www.sofmon.com](https://www.sofmon.com)

Tools to be used by your own judgment and nobody else’s.

### CTO @ Peaks
[www.peaks.com](https://www.peaks.nl)

Everyone can invest with Peaks. All you need is a bank account. Okay, and a little patience.
